bio: Get ready to say "no" a lot if Contrarioni Inspirits you. You'll disagree with anything people say. Always fun at parties.

soultimate.name: Contrary Gas
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Drops foe's Attack by 50% for 30 seconds.
soultimate.description: Foes' attack is greatly decreased for a time.

skill.effect: 10% Atk 70% Def 8% Spd 20% MM ↑ when Inspirited ↓.
skill.name: Contrarian

name: Contrarioni
